metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7995 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The xsltStylePreCompute function in preproc.c in libxslt 1.1.28 does notcheck if the parent node is an element, which allows attackers to cause adenial of service via a crafted XML file, related to a "type confusion"issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7995` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxslt1.1 - 1.1.28-2ubuntu0.1
python-libxslt1 - 1.1.28-2ubuntu0.1
xsltproc - 1.1.28-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxslt package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.28-2ubuntu0.1').
